sentences.en: " Of course. Every hotel depends upon the repute of its patrons.
sentences.cn: “ 当然啦, 每家旅馆都要依靠其主顾的名声.

sentences.en: " We can't follow the dean of student's example of visiting houses of ill repute. "
sentences.cn: 鸿渐道: “训导长寻花问柳的榜样,我们学不来. ”

sentences.en: Chicago has 6 graduate and professional schools of high repute.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥有6所颇负盛名的研究生院和专业院校。

sentences.en: He was a writer of repute.
sentences.cn: 他曾经是一位颇有名望的作者。

sentences.en: I only knew him by repute.
Like Monsieur Manette, your father, the gentleman was of repute in Paris.
sentences.cn: 这人跟令尊曼内特先生一样在巴黎也颇有名气.

sentences.en: Many specialized institutions now equal the university in repute.
sentences.cn: 现在许多专科学校的声誉可与大学相媲美.

sentences.en: She is a writer of international repute.
sentences.cn: 她是一位享有国际声誉的作家。

sentences.en: She was not in such repute for her practice as before.
sentences.cn: 她营业的声名也不像从前那么好了.

sentences.en: Some of the theatres are in bad repute.
The wine is in high repute worldwide.
sentences.cn: 这酒在世界上享有盛名.

sentences.en: They are a firm of good repute and have large financial ~ s.
sentences.cn: 该公司信誉很好,资金储备雄厚.

sentences.en: This is a district of ill repute on account of many robberies.
sentences.cn: 这一地区因为发生了许多抢劫案而名声很坏.

sentences.en: This short story was published by two journals of repute.
sentences.cn: 这篇短篇小说由两种著名的杂志刊出.

sentences.en: Under his leadership, the U.N.'s repute has risen immeasurably.
sentences.cn: 在他的领导下，联合国的名望得到了极大提升。

words.tran_cn: 声誉好的；受尊敬的；卓越的
名誉好的；被普遍认为…的
据说，一般认为；根据风评
认为（repute的过去式和过去分词）
